Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth varies based on individual needs. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at $120, which I hope aligns with your valuation and allows us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
